thread.title: BRIEF-Axar Capital Reports 17.5 Pct Stake In Stonemor Partners

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Axar Capital Reports 17.5 Pct Stake In Stonemor Partners
text:
March 9 (Reuters) - Axar Capital Management:
* AXAR CAPITAL MANAGEMENT REPORTS 17.5 PERCENT STAKE IN STONEMOR PARTNERS LP AS OF MARCH 9 - SEC FILING
* AXAR CAPITAL - INTEND TO PURSUE TALKS WITH STONEMOR REGARDING CONVERTING COâ€™S STRUCTURE FROM MASTER LIMITED PARTNERSHIP INTO A SUBCHAPTER C CORP
* AXAR CAPITAL - CONVERSION OF STONEMOR INTO SUBCHAPTER C WOULD IMPROVE CO'S OPPORTUNITIES FOR CAPITAL RAISING AND OTHER STRATEGIC TRANSACTIONS Source text: ( bit.ly/2FuKxlf )
